hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir said:"A man was buried with my father in the same grave and I felt restless until I brought him out and buried him on his own

chapter.ara-name: باب إِخْرَاجِ الْمَيِّتِ مِنَ الْقَبْرِ بَعْدَ أَنْ يُدْفَنَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Bringing The Deceased Out Of The Grave After He Has Been Buried Therein
